files.description: Minimal GitHub Actions CI workflow that runs the project runner on each push/PR, executes verify_artifacts.py to enforce required outputs, and uploads runtime/_build as an artifact.

Added minimal GitHub Actions CI to run the project runner, verify required outputs, and upload runtime/_build as an artifact.

FILE_WRITTEN:.github/workflows/ci.yml
DIR_STATE:[".github/workflows/ci.yml", ".github/workflows/verify-build-artifacts.yml"]
Summary: Added a minimal GitHub Actions CI workflow that runs the runner, enforces required outputs via verify_artifacts.py, and uploads runtime/_build as an artifact.

files.description: Command-line verifier that checks runtime/_build for required non-empty outputs (configurable via args/env), emitting a nonzero exit code on missing/empty artifacts to fail CI.

errors.detail:
rify_artifacts.py
DIR_STATE:[".dockerignore", "CHANGELOG.md", "LICENSE", "README.md", "README.reproducibility.md", "README_build_runner.md", "environment.manifest.json", "exec_1766732677186_8cxls5r.py", "pyproject.toml", "requirements.lock.txt", "requirements.txt", "verify_artifacts.py"]
Summary: Added verify_artifacts.py CLI to fail CI when required runtime/_build artifacts are missing or empty.

E:[".dockerignore", "CHANGELOG.md", "LICENSE", "README.md", "README.reproducibility.md", "README_build_runner.md", "environment.manifest.json", "exec_1766732697908_rx0j25l.py", "pyproject.toml", "requirements.lock.txt", "requirements.txt", "verify_artifacts.py"]
SUMMARY: Wrote verify_artifacts.py, a CLI verifier that fails with a nonzero exit code when required build outputs are missing or empty.

missionDescription: Add a minimal CI workflow that runs the runner on each push/PR, then uploads runtime/_build as an artifact; make the workflow fail if verify_artifacts.py reports missing/empty required outputs.
missionSuccessCriteria: Complete strategic task identified by Meta-Coordinator or escalated by Strategic Tracker

Curated insight (actionability 8-9/10): Creates continuous enforcement of end-to-end determinism by running the one-command runner in CI and failing if required artifacts are absent. This prevents regressions and aligns with 'build-spine ar...
